issue.title: [CF 1279] Arcane Charges no longer showing with TMW icon
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Cast Arcane Blast or Arcane Missiles spell using an Arcane Mage
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Icon should display number of charges

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.1.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors, the icons simply do not display

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SArcane`Charge ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S```AC ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N62102^S`| ^Sicon^^

One more comment, it stopped working when the pre-patch for Legion was released with the class changes. Hope this helps, thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Iannet

Listen to what you're saying.

They stopped working in the pre-patch. Have you tried looking at your debuffs to see if Arcane Charges are there as a debuff on your character?

Normally I don't do this, but the answer here is so exceedingly obvious that I really hesitate to give it directly. If you're going to use TMW, you need to keep up with the changes to the classes you play on even the most basic level.
